document_data.name: Campion Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Campion Dynasty''' ruled over the city-state of [[Westgate]] from the {{YearlinkName|927}}, until the {{YearlinkName|1018}}.
document_data.Monarchs:
; King [[Altarl Campion|Altarl]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|927}} – {{Yearlink|936}}. An influential merchant who was selected by his peers to rule. First King of the Campion Dynasty. 
; King [[Jhentyr Campion I|Jhentyr I]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|938}} – {{Yearlink|954}}. Firstborn son of Altarl. 
; King [[Tarnhart Campion I|Tarnhart I]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|954}} – {{Yearlink|993}}. Nephew of King Jentyr I. 
; King [[Jhentyr Campion II|Jhentyr II]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|993}} – {{Yearlink|1002}}. Second son of Tarnhart I. 
; King [[Tarnhart Campion II|Tarnhart II]] 
: Reigned {{Yearlink|1002}} – {{Yearlink|1018}}. Firstborn son of Jhentyr II.
